divs: sighting detailsgot out of work at 5:15. started driving home which isnt too far, about 2 minute drive. i got out of my car and instantly noticed a bright white strobing light. i knew it wasnt a plane, because planes frequently fliy about my area\house and there lights are usually a yellowish white hue with green\red strobing along. this object was strobing white after i got out of my car, i ran into my house grabbed my kodak playsport which shoots in hd and then ran out and started to record. when i was recording, the strobe of the object was slow. then after zoomng in the pulses of strobe appear to go off faster then again slower. it was a t a weird-random "rythm". after recording it for a min or so, it disappeared behind my neighbors house
Summary: Quick Random White strobing of lights
